mapper.select: SELECT userid FROM user WHERE userid=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(userid, username, userprofileimage, useraddress, userdetailaddress, usergrade, userrole, usergender, userage, userbirthday, useremail) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userProfileImage}, #{userAddress}, #{userDetailAddress}, #{userGrade}, #{userRole}, #{userGender}, #{userAge}, #{userBirthday}, #{userEmail})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET useraddress=#{useraddress}, userdetailaddress=#{userdetailaddress} WHERE userid=#{userid}
